import re

def remove_whitespace(string):
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', string)
    return string

import re

def remove_whitespace(string):
    string = re.sub('^[^a-zA-Z0-9]+|[^a-zA-Z0-9]+$', 'MUTATED', string)
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', string)
    return string

import re

def remove_whitespace(string):
    string = re.sub('^[^a-zA-Z0-9]+|[^a-zA-Z0-9]+$', '', string)
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('', ' ', string)
    return string

import re

def remove_whitespace(string):
    string = re.sub('^[^a-zA-Z0-9]+|[^a-zA-Z0-9]+$', '', string)
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('\\s+', '', string)
    return string
